title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 136.2 - Determination of rates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 136.2 - Determination of rates

State Regulations

Extra service shall not be allowed without specific advance
approval of the Director of the Budget. Rates of pay for extra service
performed by employees eligible to earn overtime in their regular positions
shall be determined in the same manner as for overtime (see rules for payment
of overtime compensation, section
135.8
of Part 135 of this Title)
except that a straight hourly rate shall be paid for those hours worked by an
employee as extra service which do not bring the total hours worked by the
employee in any one workweek above 40 hours. Extra service performed by an
employee not eligible to earn overtime in his regular position shall be
compensable at a rate approved by the Director of the Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
136.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
